Thanks for installing "xorsms!"

With xorsms you can send SMS messages almost instantly using gmail, as long as you know the receivers phone provider! If you're not sure of this information don't worry, xorsms will find that information for you!

!!! WARNING !!!
In order for this to work properly make sure you go to https://myaccount.google.com/ and turn on less secure access. It is not recommended you do this! So we recommend creating another gmail account and turing off less secure access after you are done using our services!
